events.message: I recently received my order, but the product is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
Case categorized under Refund based on customer request mentioning return and refund explicitly.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah for handling the refund request.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like to return your order and get a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The product didn't match the description on the website, so Iâ€™d like a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the return process for your order 789456123 and refund the full amount once we receive the item.
Thanks for your help! Please let me know how to send the product back.
We will send you a prepaid shipping label via email within the next hour. Please use it to ship the product back at your earliest convenience.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund successfully and if there is anything else I can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks for the smooth process and your great support!
Closing this case now since the refund was successfully processed and the customer is satisfied.
